Talon/Hydras/Elita:


Elita said to Nightshift =E2=80=9CDo you think that m=
y dad will be mad if we leave the base and going where they are?=E2=80=9D

=
=C2=A8***********************************

talon smiled and said to straigh=
t shot =E2=80=9CThen let=E2=80=99s got to  join him=E2=80=9D

She took the =
crossbow and headed towards the exit, she quickly left the base and flew to=
wards Tucson=E2=80=99s signal.



*****************************************=
*********

=E2=80=9CBe ready=E2=80=9Dhissed anoyed the male while his comli=
nk picke up Tucson=E2=80=99s signature =E2=80=9COpen fire at my signal...  =
This will be a large day=E2=80=9D


Hydras closed the com link and opened i=
n Tucson=E2=80=99s frecuency =E2=80=9CWell, well Prime... What bring you to=
 my territory? I=E2=80=99m not in good mood so, you should better leave whi=
le you can=E2=80=9D


From: Sandy Panico 
Sent: Sunday, August 07, 2011 7:3=
0 PM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
Subject: Re: Strange meetings - the Silver=
 Dragon and the Preds




Tucson looks to the stars briefly.  He wished he =
could enjoy them along with Rodimus on a more pleasant note, but the turn o=
f events sours his mood.  The carnage angers him, sending him into a deep t=
hroated growl of displeasure.  His temper would not hold for much longer.  =
He composes himself only to communicate with Rodimus.

" Look, below us.   =
THAT has no right happening.  Hydras has gone too far, and it's time he was=
 put in his place!"

With a roar of sheer rage, he turns on the surrounding=
 Predacons releasing a powerful stream of fire, flames a bright hue of red,=
 yellow and blue.

" Now let's show Hydras what happens when he preys on in=
nocent creatures!"

Perpetually on the move and constantly busy. 

On Aug 7=
, 2011, at 6:36 PM, Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:


    
=
  > <OLD - Tuscon>
  >
  > Tucson continues Eastward in the direction Rodim=
us was pointing. The wind
  > was strong and fast enough to carry him on ou=
tstretched wings as he glides
  > swiftly across the darkening sky. Then a =
faint scent catches his nostrils.
  >
  > " We're in the right direction, R=
odimus. I can smell him. Neither Maximal,
  > Autobot, Decepticon or Predac=
on. It's far more foul than that. I believe
  > I've just locked in on our =
query. "
  >
  > A mighty dragon on the hunt, Tucson swiftly flies onward a=
nd spots a mech
  > floating in the air, hovering. Not having encountered S=
aberback, he stops
  > and circles the area around him.
  >
  > " Rodimus, =
be ready. Leo Prime, We're here. I have the enemy sighted."
  >
  > Tucson =
makes himself heard with a very loud roar.

  <NEW>

  OOC: Sandy, since yo=
u posted Tuscon as arriving already I am doing a
  small time jump.

  OOC:=
 Airly, several hours have passed and I am merging the post
  between Tusco=
n and the Preds. The Preds are carrying out Hydras' last
  order, to burn t=
he Dinosaurs. Feel free to post yourself where you
  like. See the end of t=
he post for your cue.

  BIC:

  The mighty dragon that is TUSCON moved swi=
ftly over mountains, rivers
  and valleys, great forests pass beneath TUSCo=
n and his passenger.
  TUSCON's powerful wings propel him through the open =
skies pausing only
  as thermals and updrafts allow him to soar giving him =
precious moments
  of rest as he continued his flight.

  He has covered hu=
ndreds of miles in the space of a few hours and the
  sun has set, disappea=
ring behind the ever distant horizon. Stars wink
  at TUSCON and RODIMUS pl=
easently like bright jewles on black velvet,
  the moon like some giant bau=
bel, glowing brightly.

  "Will you look at that." RODIMUS said in awe as h=
e pointed ahead of them.

  As TUSCON arrives at where he would have though=
t their enemy to be he
  realizes that it was not the scent of the stranger=
 that he caught, but
  it was the strong aroma of dead flesh mixed with fir=
e, smoke and
  burning meat. There is a great fire going on, one that seems=
 to be
  raging for miles.

  In the distance TUSCON can pick up the defini=
te scent of Predacon
  energy signatures, their dark forms darting over the=
 fire looking
  almost like moths over a bright flame. However these moths =
are firing
  blasts of energy at the fire keeping it bright and hot.

  Eve=
n as TUSCON was picking up the Predacons, they seemed to be
  becoming awar=
e of him as well as several of them fanned out
  defensively.

  **********=
*******************

  At the same time HYDRAS also gets a message from FRA=
CTYL, "Sir. We are
  picking up a strange Maximal signature is approaching =
the area of the
  burning Dinosaurs. It is quite large and approaching quic=
kly."

  (TAG)

  Preston
